name: ZZ - MLB Extra Bases
description:
MLB Extra Bases is a promotional site for Bank of America members to redeem points for experiences, merchandise, tickets or cash.

NOTE: Due to poor performance of the BofA reward site, you may receive server communication errors or be required to authenticate a number of times repeatedly due to timeouts.  This is known and expected behavior.
NOTE: Cannot test "Manage your Account" as this links to the Production site.
NOTE: Cannot test "Tickets" as availability is not configured.

QA URL: http://qa.mlbextrabases.com/
